law.catch_line: Actions for trespass, waste, rent or profits not barred.
law.text: The proceedings under a writ of forcible entry or detainer shall not bar an action for trespass or waste or rent or mesne profits.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 468.
